titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard deduction for taxable years 2026 and 2027 by the tariff rebate amount.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard deduction for taxable years 2026 and 2027 by the tariff rebate amount.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
